configurableConfig.description: Input numbers for the top left corner coordinates. These may be readjusted if a portion of the window ends up outside the screen.
configurableConfig.label: Y Origin

script:
if [[ "$(sw_vers -productVersion | cut -d. -f1)" -lt 12 ]]
then
  echo 'Setting window bounds requires macOS Monterey (12) or above.' >&2
  exit 1
fi

../window-bounds.js 'current' 'custom' "${x}" "${y}" '' ''
taskDescription: Set custom position for topmost window
